text: @SenSchumer Chuck Schumer listen to me I want to be very clear the majority of the American people want you Nancy Pelosi Adam Schiff Jerry Nadler Maxine Waters Bernie Sanders Joe Biden and all the rest of the deep state Democrats all to get COVID-19 all you people belong in prison
